title: Vetted Contractor Platform in Europe | 30Sek
description: Find vetted contractors across Europe for heating, electrical, finishing, roofing, foundations and 24/7 emergency work.

home.title: A trusted way to get renovation and repair work done
home.lead: From urgent fixes to full renovations: clear request flow, transparent steps, and fast contractor responses.
trustPoints: Clear process from request to execution
Multiple contractor categories in one platform
Built-in calculators for estimates and planning

howItWorks.title: 1) Describe the work
howItWorks.text: Select a service, attach photos/video, and provide site details.

howItWorks.title: 2) Receive responses
howItWorks.text: We route your request to relevant contractors by expertise and availability.

howItWorks.title: 3) Start execution
howItWorks.text: Align timeline and price, then move to work execution with less friction.

categories.name: Engineering Systems
categories.description: Heating, plumbing, and electrical work focused on reliability and safety.

categories.name: Construction and Structures
categories.description: Foundations, roofing, structural carpentry, demolition, and machinery.

categories.name: Finishing and Interiors
categories.description: Interior quality work: finishing, design, cleanup, and sale preparation.

categories.name: Outdoor and Urgent
categories.description: Outdoor upgrades, moving support, and emergency response 24/7.

services.name: Plumber
services.overview: Book installation, repair, or emergency support for plumbing and drainage systems.

services.name: Electrician
services.overview: Safe electrical works for apartments, houses, and commercial facilities.

services.name: Heating
services.overview: Heating system installation, balancing, and upgrades with transparent cost planning.

services.name: Interior Finishing
services.overview: Full-cycle interior works for residential and commercial spaces.

services.name: Carpenters
services.overview: Structural woodwork and construction carpentry with precise execution.

services.name: Joiners
services.overview: High-quality joinery solutions for interior and structure-related needs.

services.name: Wood House Construction
services.overview: Timber house projects from base structure to ready-for-handover stage.

services.name: Foundations
services.overview: Foundation construction, concreting, and structural base preparation.

services.name: Roofers
services.overview: Roof repairs, replacements, and preventive works for private and commercial buildings.

services.name: Exterior Works
services.overview: Facades, fencing, and outdoor upgrades delivered in one coordinated flow.

services.name: Construction Machinery
services.overview: Machinery support for excavation, demolition prep, and site setup phases.

services.name: Procurement and Delivery
services.overview: Material planning, sourcing, and delivery coordination aligned to project timelines.

services.name: Moving Services
services.overview: Residential and office moving with safe packing and route coordination.

services.name: Post-Renovation Cleaning
services.overview: Detailed post-renovation cleanup to prepare a site for handover or move-in.

services.name: Design Services
services.overview: Interior planning, style direction, and practical decisions aligned with execution.

services.name: Agent Services
services.overview: Support for property positioning, preparation, and sale communication.

services.name: Demolition
services.overview: Controlled demolition for renovation starts and structural preparation.

services.name: 24h Property Refresh
services.overview: Fast visual property refresh before sale, listing, or handover.

services.name: Emergency Work 24/7
services.overview: Rapid response for urgent water, electrical, heating, and structural incidents.
